summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant and System; authorizing expenditures for the modernization of the Cedar Falls Generating Plant, the conversion of a transmission line and the replacement of wood stave penstock with welded steel penstock and other necessary and incidental work as additions, betterments and extensions to said system; making transfers and appropriations from the surplus in the Light Fund as an advance to capital account therefor and from the Light Department Construction Fund.
